location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is written from Bombay. Stannus asks to be relieved of a charge for 120 rupees levied by the office of the Civil Auditor. The amount in question arose from a clerical error in a letter sent to the Secretary of the Marine Department, relating to a payment to Sookias Gaspar, formerly Comprador of the Marine at Bushere [Bushire].
